events.name: onPress
events.description: Handler that is called when the press is released over the target.

events.name: onPressStart
events.description: Handler that is called when a press interaction starts.

events.name: onPressEnd
events.description: Handler that is called when a press interaction ends, either over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.

events.name: onPressChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the press state changes.

events.name: onPressUp
events.description: Handler that is called when a press is released over the target, regardless of whether it started on the target or not.

fullWidth.description: Whether the card should take the full width of its parent.

isHoverable.description: Whether the card should change the background on hover.

isPressable.description: Whether the card should allow to be pressed.

isBlurred.description: Whether the card background should be blurred.

isFooterBlurred.description: Whether the card footer background should be blurred.

isDisabled.description: Whether the card should be disabled. The press events will be ignored.

disableRipple.description: Whether to disable ripple effect. Only when `isPressable` is true.

allowTextSelectionOnPress.description: Whether to allow text selection on pressing. Only when `isPressable` is true.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the card slots.
